transArray.content: Very satisfied with a stay. The location of the hotel is on Qianmen Street, less than 5 minutes away from the subway entrance and bus station. The hotel is intelligent, no need to insert a room card to enter the room, automatic curtains, night lights, and mobile phone holders. Dashilan is next to the hotel, you can walk to experience all kinds of snacks in Beijing. Away from high-rise buildings and the hustle and bustle of the city. The hotel also has a night snack at ten o'clock in the evening, a bowl of warm food on a rainy night.
